Before executing an action, make sure you create a full backup of your TYPO3 database!
This extension is hosted on GitHub. Feel free to submit feedback, bugs and changerequest directly at
TemplaVoila to Fluidtemplate and Grid Elements
TemplaVoila to Fluid/GE is a set of tools which can be helpful when you want to migrate an existing TYPO3 website from TemplaVoila to Fluid / GridElements
Delete unreferenced elements
records has been marked as deleted.
Searches recursive on all pages for unreferenced elements and sets all found elements as deleted in the TYPO3 database.
Convert reference elements to 'insert records' elements
records has been converted.
Searches recursive on all pages for TemplaVoila reference elements and converts them to 'insert records' elements.
Migrate TV FCE content to Grid Element

Migrates the content from the selected FCE to the selected Grid Element and changes the content element type to Grid Element. If the FCE contains content columns, you can remap them to Grid Element columns.
Note: After migration all Grid Elements with shortcut-records will not be shown on the output page if TemplaVoila is still installed.
Migrate content from TemplaVoila to Fluidtemplate

Migrate content from TemplaVoila content columns to Fluid backend layout columns. Use this module if you have several TemplaVoila content columns which do not have an oldStyleColumnNumber setting or if you want to rearrange content elements from TemplaVoila content columns to Fluid backend layout columns.
All TemplaVoila backend layout settings on pages will be replaced with the selected Fluid backend layout.

After content migration, you should not rearrage or create new content elements on pages with a Fluid Template, when TemplaVoila is still installed. TemplaVoila uses a method named correctSortingAndColposFieldsForPage, which may move all content elements to column 0.
content elements have been updated.
page templates have been updated.
Convert GridElements where the language is set to "all languages"

On multilingual sites you can set the language of TemplaVoila FCEs to "all languages" and translate multilingual content directly inside the FCE container. Using backend layouts and GridElements this can cause some problems after migrating of a TemplaVoila site with this extension and I would recommend to use a translated Grid Element for each page language.

This converter clones Grid Elements with "all languages" so you have individually translated Grid Elements for each page translation. The conversion process also reassigns all child content elements of the original Grid element to the now translated Grid Element.
After using this converter, you should use the "Fix sorting" module to correct the sorting of translated content elements.

Use this converter after you have migrated your TV FCEs and the page content. Also make sure you create another SQL dump of the migrated TYPO3 database so you quickly can do a rollback if the conversion does not work as expected.
Grid Elements clones have been created.
content elements have been updated.
Fix sorting of translated content elements

Fixes the sorting of all translated content elements for the given page UID or for all pages. You should use this action after FCE / content migration and when the sorting of translated content elements is not as expected in TYPO3 page module.
As a result of this action, the sorting of all translated content elements will be the same as the sorting of the original content elements.

Use this module after you have migrated your TV FCEs and the page content. Also make sure you create another SQL dump of the migrated TYPO3 database so you quickly can do a rollback if the result does'nt look as expected.
You must enter a page UID
translated content elements have been updated
content elements have been updated.
flexible content elements have been migrated.
